summary: Tired of everyone belting out Age of Aggression? Now bards will do what they do best-- play their instruments, with no added singing.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple modification to the bard's shared song script, which prevents them from selecting any songs on their own that require singing. As a result, they will cycle through more immersive, pleasantly ambient drum, lute, and flute music instead, and no one will have to flee at top speed from inns any longer!

Songs can still be requested in case you run a Makulah mod, or just want to torture your roommate.

SCRIPT FILE WAS MISSING IN .rar OF INITIAL RELEASE; PLEASE DOWNLOAD CURRENT VERSION. :)
A no flute songs option is also available for those who don't like the shrillness.

Feedback/comments/requests welcome!


::UPCOMING CHANGES/VERSIONS::
* Looking into request to lower volume of flute songs.
*Instrument-specific installs: don't want flute? There will be no flute. Only want drums? We've got that, too.
author: cruelasthegrave

files.name: Quieter Bards Loose Files
files.changelogHtml:
Corrected a bug that allowed bards to still select "Age of..." when running through the potential song list.
Added a loose files install option for those having difficulty installing from the BSA.
Removed the BSA option until I can troubleshoot packing the script files.
Uploaded an optional version of the mod that removes all flute songs from the available song pool.
